===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|どうぞく|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|どうぞく}}

# someone or something of the [[same]] [[bloodline]], [[clan]], [[tribe]], or [[group]]
# a [[chemical]] [[element]] of the same [[w:Group_(periodic_table)|group]]
